name: SIDAPRO FSB UNG
desc: Application that can manage the administrative process for students and lecturers regarding the submission of thesis titles to the judiciary.

name: SIATU PPG UNG
desc: Application that can manage the registration process, scheduling, and learning for PPG students.

name: Pusat Data Fakultas FSB UNG
desc: Application that can collect faculty data for lecturer and student accreditation purposes.

name: EMPATHY
desc: Application that makes it easy to order ambulances effectively and efficiently using the voice recording method.

name: Sistem Informasi Geografis Desa
desc: Application that makes it easier for villages to publish village activities and is equipped with GIS features to display certain maps.

name: WebGis KKN Destana
desc: Application that displays data on evacuation routes and gathering points for each village in Bulawa District.

name: Hivisitscreen
desc: Application to make it easier to order HIV screening and several other medical features.

name: RistiApp
desc: Application to make it easier to having an information about UKM Risti UNG.

name: Gorontalo Satu Data
desc: Application to make it easier to having an information about UKM Risti UNG.

name: GoVillage
desc: Application designed to digitize village administration and public services to enhance efficiency and accessibility for rural communities.

name: SINERGI
desc: Application that facilitates regional development planning through Working Paper (Kertas Kerja) features with real-time SIPD integration.

name: SIH3
desc: Integrated platform for Hydrology, Hydrogeology, and Hydrometeorology Information System (SIH3) that facilitates water resource data management in collaboration with PUPR, River Basin Organization, and BMKG.

name: E-Commerce Kotamobagu
desc: E-commerce platform specifically designed for Kotamobagu city to empower local MSMEs and facilitate digital transactions for regional products.

name: Dinul Islam - Digital Lettering
desc: Digital lettering application designed to streamline administrative correspondence and document management for the Dinul Islam program at Universitas Muhammadiyah Gorontalo.
